channel.title: Need Server Upload Info
channel.description:
Soo you upload the server and people are playing on it.
I don't understand how you can update/rdit shit if te files are on your computer.
I realize this sounds moronic but I'm a very immature coder.

item.title: Need Server Upload Info
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:3, topic:478650”][quote author=Sunbred Rush link=topic=596876.msg4202938#msg4202938 date=1358480923]
Soo you upload the server and people are playing on it.

I don’t understand how you can update/rdit shit if te files are on your computer.

I realize this sounds moronic but I’m a very immature coder.
[/quote]
You edit the .java files, correct?
The server runs on the .class files that the compiler, or an IDE builds.[/quote]Fixed

Read full topic

You edit the .java files, correct?
The server runs on the .class files that the compiler, or eclipse builds.
